text: Gerry Koning (born 3 January 1980) is a Dutch former footballer who played as a right back. He played for FC Volendam, Excelsior, RBC Roosendaal and SC Heerenveen. ==External links== * Voetbal International profile Category:Living people Category:1980 births Category:People from Volendam Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Dutch footballers Category:SBV Excelsior players Category:RBC Roosendaal players Category:FC Volendam players Category:SC Heerenveen players Category:Eredivisie players Category:Eerste Divisie players
title: Gerry Koning
